name: Computer
text: Looking for something fun and transportive?

name: Zara
text: That's exactly what I'm looking for.

name: Computer
text: Then maybe you'll want this jetpack.

name: Computer
text: A jetpack is a rocket worn on the back that allows a person to fly using jets of air. It provides vertical takeoff and sustained flight capabilities.

name: Computer
text: Well, then go get it. But don't forget to get some fuel along the way. No fuel? No fly.
